cooldown: >>> ⌚ | You have just used this command. Try again in `{remaining}`.
owneronly: >>> {emoji.redcross} | Only bot developers of **{bot}** are able to use this command.
blacklisted: >>> {emoji.redcross} | You or this server is blacklisted, you can no longer use this bot. Please join our [support server](https://stereo-bot.tk/discord) if you want to appeal.
permissions: >>> 👮‍♂️ | You need the following permissions to execute this command: {permissions}.
partner: >>> {emoji.redcross} | You can only use this command in partnered servers.
error: >>> {emoji.error} | Oh no, this doesn't look good. Something caused our mail bird to fly back home, please try again later.
error_raw:
>>> {emoji.error} | {error}
Please join our [support server](https://stereo-bot.tk/discord) if this keeps happening.

errors.preconditionGuildOnly: >>> {emoji.redcross} | You can only use this command in a server.
errors.slashCommandPreconditionDmOnly: >>> {emoji.redcross} | You can only use this command in DMs.
